mutants.code:
def max_lucky_tickets(n, pieces):
    l = [0, 0, 0]
    for item in pieces:
        l[item % 3] -= 1
    a = l[0]
    b = l[1]
    c = l[2]
    return min(b, c) + a // 2

def max_lucky_tickets(n, pieces):
    l = [0, 0, 0]
    for item in pieces:
        l[item % 3] += 1
    a = l[0]
    b = l[1]
    c = l[2]
    return min(b, c) - a // 2
